    • ADDITIONAL_LAUNCHERS

      public static final OptionValue<List<Options>> ADDITIONAL_LAUNCHERS
      Processed additional launcher property files.

      Items in the list are in the order "--add-launcher" options appeared on the command line. Every item in the list has SOURCE_PROPERY_FILE option with the value set to the source property file and NAME option with the value set to the additional launcher name.

    • FILE_ASSOCIATIONS

      public static final OptionValue<List<Options>> FILE_ASSOCIATIONS
      Processed file association property files.

      Items in the list are in the order "--file-associations" options appeared on the command line. Every item in the list has SOURCE_PROPERY_FILE option with the value set to the source property file.

    • SOURCE_PROPERY_FILE

      public static final OptionValue<Path> SOURCE_PROPERY_FILE

    • BUNDLING_OPERATION_DESCRIPTOR

      public static final OptionValue<BundlingOperationDescriptor> BUNDLING_OPERATION_DESCRIPTOR
